description: Building and maintaining accessibility-focused web applications for a pet insurance company. My role involves integration of new brands into existing systems, improving existing functionalities, and ensuring the applications are efficient and user-friendly.

Developed solutions for a Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) company, focusing on data integration and transformation. In my role, my work involved building data pipelines, integrating ETL processes and various third-party APIs.
Designed, implemented, and supported scalable software solutions across various projects. Tasks involved integrating new features and APIs and improving existing functionality.
